itemDescription: English footballer who played in the Football League for Barnsley and Oldham Athletic, born 1895

wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Cooper (1895–unknown) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Barnsley and Oldham Athletic.

response: * Arthur Cooper (athlete) (born 1952), Trinidad and Tobago sprinter
* Arthur Cooper (translator) (1916–1988), British diplomat and translator of Chinese literature
